data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong northeast monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong on the third day of Lunar New Year. It will remain relatively cool in the morning over the region. With the monsoon moderating, it will be warm during the day over Guangdong on Friday and over the weekend. A relatively humid easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of southern China early next week. It will be cloudier over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260219","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
